body: Waiting for translations for the other doujins.

No one cares or should if you love or hate the source material aka manga/anime, this is a fanfiction doujin, uneffected by/on the canon unless the og author says otherwise. Enjoy if you like ntr or move along if you don't. No matter the characters or anime there will be ntr of them made somewhere. You can't stop it, try to not be too bother by someone non canon fanfic. If you can't get use to it, blacklist the artist or check to tags before you decide to read. Justfication on both end is plain bs when it comes to a doujin.
@Nothing9487566 rule 34 dude. Izumi is a reliable guy yes. It's just author and other readers feel jealous of him amd want him to suffer. Human is cruel hen they are jealous.
@Nothing94875566 commenting that on all shikimori ntr lmao just stop izumi deserves to be ntr'ed

@Nothing94875566 fucking Shiro Emiya, Lelouch, Naruto, Sakurai from Uzaki, Tadano from Komi, the chad Kazuma of Konosuba and even Tomoya from Clannad, both in After Story and Tomoyo After, got NTR in doujinshi and you think just because little izumi decide to man up a little in 5 chapters or more he doesn't deserve to get NTR in a doujinshi work?!

Do yourself a favor and blacklist the netorare tag.
@Nothing94875566 i only watched the anime and i think he's a sissy loser boy who deserve to get NTR'ed hard and get his girl taken away from him by a chad
@Nothing94875566 just for parody tho, and if u don't think she deserve ntr just dont read it XD

If you guys go watch the manga of those are not animation yet, you will understand how Izumi work hard to become a reliable man who don't want to always rely on shikimori,I don't think he deserves NTR.
